formulas.name: formula_ErrorMessageCM1
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM1_1}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_1}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_1})),"", IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_1}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_1})), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Other1AmountTaxIncluded__c} = {!input_AmountCM1_1} ,"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Other1ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_1}), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Other1AmountTaxIncluded__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_1}+{!input_AmountCM2_1}) ,"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Other1ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Other1AmountTaxIncluded__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_1}+ {!input_AmountCM2_1} + {!input_AmountCM3_1}),"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Other1ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。" ))))

formulas.name: formula_ErrorMessageCM2
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM1_2}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_2}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_2})),"", IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_2}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_2})), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Other2AmountTaxIncluded__c} = {!input_AmountCM1_2} ,"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Other2ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_2}), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Other2AmountTaxIncluded__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_2} + {!input_AmountCM2_2}) ,"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Other2ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Other2AmountTaxIncluded__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_2} + {!input_AmountCM2_2} + {!input_AmountCM3_2}),"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Other2ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。" ))))

formulas.name: formula_ErrorMessageCM3
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM1_3}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_3}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_3})),"", IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_3}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_3})), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty1__c} = {!input_AmountCM1_3} ,"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty1ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_3}), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty1__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_3} + {!input_AmountCM2_3}) ,"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty1ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty1__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_3} + {!input_AmountCM2_3} + {!input_AmountCM3_3}),"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty1ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。" ))))

formulas.name: formula_ErrorMessageCM4
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM1_4}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_4}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_4})),"", IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_4}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_4})), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty2__c} = {!input_AmountCM1_4} ,"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty2ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_4}), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty2__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_4} + {!input_AmountCM2_4}) ,"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty2ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty2__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_4} + {!input_AmountCM2_4} + {!input_AmountCM3_4}),"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty2ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。" ))))

formulas.name: formula_ErrorMessageCM5
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM1_5}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_5}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_5})),"", IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_5}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_5})), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty3__c} = {!input_AmountCM1_5} ,"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty3ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM3_5}), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty3__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_5} + {!input_AmountCM2_5}) ,"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty3ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF({!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty3__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_5} + {!input_AmountCM2_5} + {!input_AmountCM3_5}),"",{!var_CancelCalculate.Penalty3ExpenseItems__c}&"の合計金額が正しくありません。" ))))
